name: DCC FORUM Limited
legal: Private company limited by guarantee without share capital
goal: The DCC Forum regroups the main international providers of Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC). It helps customers to understand the options available when paying abroad with their credit and debit cards and promotes a fair and transparent use of DCC within the industry. DCC Forum's members adhere to a set of principles advocating best practices of DCC.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Consumers
euInitiatives: Follow up of the amendments to the regulation 924/2009, approved in March 2019.
